    REST-assured!

    less than 1 minute read 

    @Test
public void given_one_income_then_correct_output_is_returned() {
    given()
      .param("aanvragerBedr", 45000).
    when()
      .get("/aanvragingen").
    then()
      .body("maxInkomenBedr", is(188600));
}
